mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT depart_name FROM hotel_department WHERE level='0') AS "departName", (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM hotel_department WHERE level='1') AS "departNum", (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM hotel_department WHERE level='2') AS "proNum", (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM hotel_department WHERE level='3') AS "gradeNum" FROM hotel_department LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_department(parent_id , level , depart_name , create_by , create_time,school_Id ) VALUES ( #{parentId}, #{level} , #{departName} , #{createUser} , #{createTime},#{schoolId} )
